data.name: Agents of Mayhem - Franchise Force Skins Pack
data.detailed_description:
Keep on, ‘cause the Force don't stop! The Franchise only gets better with three new outfits. “Rod The Bounty Hunter” sheds his sleeves and takes it to the streets. Hardtack is a real dreamboat in his dinner dress. Fortune flies high in steam-driven style. Collect ‘em all!

Content included:


  • Hollywood Geo-Skin
  • Hardtack Geo-Skin
  • Fortune Geo-Skin
data.about_the_game:
Keep on, ‘cause the Force don't stop! The Franchise only gets better with three new outfits. “Rod The Bounty Hunter” sheds his sleeves and takes it to the streets. Hardtack is a real dreamboat in his dinner dress. Fortune flies high in steam-driven style. Collect ‘em all!

data.short_description: Keep on, ‘cause the Force don't stop! The Franchise only gets better with three new outfits. “Rod The Bounty Hunter” sheds his sleeves and takes it to the streets. Hardtack is a real dreamboat in his dinner dress. Fortune flies high in steam-driven style. Collect ‘em all!
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
最低:
  • OS: Windows 7/8/10 64bit
  • プロセッサー: Intel Core i3-3240 or above / or AMD equivalent
  • メモリー: 8192 MB RAM
  • グラフィック: GeForce GTX 750 Ti or above / or AMD equivalent
  • ストレージ: 38 MB 利用可能
pc_requirements.recommended:
推奨:
  • OS: Windows 7/8/10 64bit
  • プロセッサー: Intel Core i5-4670K or above / or AMD equivalent
  • メモリー: 12288 MB RAM
  • グラフィック: GeForce GTX 1060 or above / or AMD equivalent
  • ストレージ: 38 MB 利用可能
